Subject: Password Expiration Notice

Employee,

As part of our regular security checks, we noticed that your current password will expire in 24 hours. To avoid any disruption to your work, please update your password by following these steps:

Once you have updated your password, please make sure to update it on all your devices (computer, phone, etc.) by following the device-specific instructions available in our internal documentation.
